title: Social Domain Problem-Solving Competency Development Using Web-Based Visual Scaffolding

context.prior_knowledge: Basic comprehension of social phenomena and experience in utilizing digital tools
context.additional_context: Mobile-optimized environment centered on smartphones, supporting self-directed learning through visual tools

learning_goals: Learners can perform the three-step social issue analysis process with 80% accuracy using visual scaffolding tools.
Learners can identify and present core elements of project tasks with over 90% accuracy through visual diagrams.
Learners can derive five or more specific improvement points during peer assessment using a visual feedback system in mobile environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
